item.title: Sharing code position from emacs
item.description: There are times when you want to share an exact code location with somebody. Maybe you’ve just shown them something and want to follow up with an IM message. Or you want to add something to a bug tracker issue. The thing is that a code is opened in your favorite editor, so you know everything about a commit, a file and a line number. But to share a link you need to go to some kind of a web git UI and search for exact same things there.
